newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-REGGIANA'S ROMANIAN SABAU TEARS MENISCUS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-REGGIANA'S ROMANIAN SABAU TEARS MENISCUS.

text.p: Reggiana's Romanian midfielder Ioan Sabau tore the meniscus in his left knee and will be out of action for 40 days, the club said on Monday.
The Romanian was injured in the opening minutes of Reggiana's 3-0 away defeat at Sampdoria on Sunday. The club are bottom of serie A and look doomed to relegation.
The 29-year-old international joined Reggiana this season after four years at nearby Brescia.
